descriptions.configureHDDLInstructions: Use the Configuration Guide to set up the dependencies on the host system.
descriptions.installPythonWindows: Follow instructions on installing Python on Windows. Select "Add Python 3.X to PATH" option during installation. To verify the installation, type *python --version* in the Windows PowerShell. If Python is installed, you will see its version.

allocateMemoryForDocker.macOS: It is recommended to allocate at least 8GB Memory in the Docker Desktop settings. Follow instructions to learn how to open settings.
allocateMemoryForDocker.windows: It is recommended to allocate at least 8GB Memory in the Docker Desktop settings. Follow instructions to learn how to open settings.
